title: error updating from 5.0.25 to 6.0.0.13
body:
hello, i just updated owncloud on my debian server (apt-get dist-upgrade) but got an error, see the information below.
please advise, thank you :-)

### server configuration
operating system:	debian 3.2.46-1+deb7u1 x86_64 gnu/linux
web server: server version:	apache/2.2.22 (debian)
database:	sqlite3
php version:	5.4.4-14+deb7u5
owncloud version:	5.0.25
updated from older or fresh install:	updated from 5.0.25 to 6.?
list of activated app: -
the content of config/config.php: 
<?php
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => 'xxxxxxxxxx',
  'passwordsalt' => 'xxxxxxxxxx',
  'datadirectory' => '/var/www/owncloud/data',
  'dbtype' => 'sqlite3',
  'version' => '6.0.0.13',
  'installed' => true,
  'forcessl' => true,
  'theme' => '',
  'maintenance' => true,
);


### logs
#### web server error log: there are no errors in the server log...

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
